summary: A great Asian love story, an unforgettable tale about passion, death and reincarnation. A mesmerizing Himalayan epic that spans two centuries, from the Silk Route of the early 19th century to the bustling metropolis of modern-day Tokyo.
cast: Milind Soman|Mylène Jampanoï|Naseeruddin Shah|Jampa Kalsang Tamang|Anil Yadav|Migmar Tashi|Tashi Dhondup|Nawang Tharchin|Urgyen Tsering|Skalsang|Phuntsok Namgyal Dhumkhang|Tsega|Amchok Jigmet|Tseten Dorje|Tsering Bawa|Amrit Pal|Joginder Singh|Narender Singh|Eri|Shinmei Tsuji|Shûji Ôtsuki|Mitsuyo Ishigaki|Reina Hara|Shunsuke Suganuma|Yanagisaw Kimiko|Kazuyuki Tsumura|Masayoshi Haneda|Hiroshi Honjomaru|Kôji Satô|Gô Ayano|Yasuko Hokari|Hiroshi Masutani|Masaki Miura|Amritpal Singh|Megumu Takada|Lhakpa Tsering
title: Valley of Flowers
